name: Agra with Kachhpura Village Experience
description: Embrace yourself with the mesmeric city of Agra that has man historical delights to explore. The highlight is the tour of the world famous Taj Mahal, a gem of India. Enhancing the whole experience is the riveting walking tour of Kachhpura village. Over here, interact with the indigenous people and savour the true essence of Indian rustic hamlets.
